snippet: There is a wide chasm in the debate over gun control, but sometimes both sides like a good gun metaphor when making their points.
abstract: Debate over gun control has been harried not only by wide chasm in beliefs, but by steady stream of poorly-chosen language; leaders on both sides have often used unintentional and awkward gun metaphors while advocating their cause.
lead_paragraph: There is a wide chasm in the debate over gun control, but sometimes both sides like a good gun metaphor when making their points.

headline.seo: Gun Imagery Fills Language of Debate
headline.main: In Gun Debate, Even Language Can Be Loaded
headline.print_headline: In Debate Over Curbing Gun Violence, Even Language Can Be Loaded
